### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (60.0, -60.0), a burner inserter at position (60.5, -61.5), and another burner inserter at position (61.5, -61.5).

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (107.5, -33.5) and connected pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -33.5), and (110.5, -33.5).

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) and connected pipes at positions (109.5, -33.5), (110.5, -33.5), (113.5, -32.5), (109.5, -31.5), (113.5, -31.5), and (112.5, -30.5).

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5) and a connected pipe at position (115.5, -31.5).

### Electricity Network
Consists of small electric poles at positions (111.5, -27.5), (111.5, -30.5), and (112.5, -24.5) with an electricity group id of 577196, and another small electric pole at position (120.5, -26.5) with an electricity group id of 577198.

### Belt
Consists of a belt from position (63.5, -53.5) to the right and another belt from position (64.5, -53.5) to the right.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure there are no existing objects in the way before attempting to place a pipe.
- Check the target location for any obstacles or entities that may be blocking the placement of the pipe.

### Errors when using burners
- Ensure the burner has enough fuel to operate.
- Check the burner's neighbors to ensure they are properly connected and functioning.

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined or invoked.
- Important variables:
  - `transport-belt`: 8
  - `small-electric-pole`: 8
  - `pipe`: 22
  - `stone-furnace`: 1
  - `wood`: 2
  - `iron-ore`: 4
  - `copper-ore`: 20
  - `iron-plate`: 613
  - `copper-plate`: 1
  - `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
